content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
All Day and a Night contains 8 new wardens, 8 new prison maps and 8 new plots to expand your prison experience and bend the rules!

Expose your prison to a whole host of new characters who can impact your prison in different ways. Run experiments on the inmates, expose them to fine dining and jack up your armed guards to handle even the toughest situations.

Experience new prisons that range from ultra-secure facilities with moats and fences to luxury prisons with elegant cells and everything in between. You can even land your prisoners on The Rock, the notorious prison that inspired Prison Architect.

Build your penitentiary on exciting new plots, including an abandoned oil facility, the banks of a historic lake, an abandoned city block and a desolate desert!



Additional hardware required for Remote Play.

1 player
Remote Play
1080p HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
